decimal-places.name: Percentage decimals
decimal-places.description: Amount of decimal places used for level progress percentage

position.name: Position
position.description: Where to place the run info widget on the screen

show-icon.name: Show icon
show-icon.description: Shows the icon for the current mode

show-mode.name: Show mode
show-mode.description: Shows the text for the current mode

show-from.name: Show "From %"
show-from.description: Shows from which % the current run is from

show-in-percentage.name: Show in percentage
show-in-percentage.description: Shows the current run in the main "x%" text at the top, e.g. "3-57%"

show-in-progress-bar.name: Show in progress bar
show-in-progress-bar.description: Shows the starting % of the current run in the progress bar

use-start-pos.name: Use startpos icon
use-start-pos.description: Whether to use the startpos icon for testmode

same-line.name: Same line
same-line.description: Puts the "From %" text in the same line as the icon if the mode label is disabled
